title: r/Relationships My Boyfriend Said He Wants to Kill Me!
description:
r/Relationships_Advice Today's episode is much creepier than normal. OP's boyfriend has a tendency to be controlling and violent, and one day he says that he's "in the mood to kill her." WTF?! What is that supposed to mean? Is he actually serious or is he trying to scare her? Either way, that's seriously screwed up and OP needs to get out of that relationship ASAP! If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
